channel.title: Welcome message as a chat interface
channel.description:
Hello I feel like a have tried every file in my client. I want to change or delete the welcome message that appears on my client except I cannot find where to change it !!!! someone please help if you have any ideas. Here is a picture to help you understand more.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33ygcy9.jpg[/img]
This appears in the chatbox when I log in
RESOLVED IF ANYONE NEEDS HELP WITH THIS PLEASE PM ME
